apps.name: JavDB
apps.subtitle: Online Information source for adult movies.
apps.versionDescription:
English
* Increase the function of renewal
* Add USDT withdrawal method, more stable and safe
Add AV information column, currently reprinted from playno1.com
* Optimize the interface of identify actors and identify videos, solve the problem of lagging when there are too many photos in the album
* Optimize the interface of video big picture browsing, add small thumbnail display at the bottom
* Newest and Recent magnetic chain update double-click the title to perform change a group operation, the way of one-hand operation
* Add more information display for my-personal information
* Fix the issue that the quick menu disappeared after long pressing My.
* Fix the issue that the video is not grayed out after clicked.
* Other problems fixed and optimized.

Chinese
* 播放器增加續播功能
* 代理增加USDT提現方式，更穩定安全
* 增加AV資訊欄目，目前轉載自playno1.com
* 「識演員」和「識影片」界面優化，解決相冊照片過多時的卡頓問題
* 影片大圖瀏覽界面優化，增加底部小縮略圖顯示
* 首頁「最新上架」和「近期磁鏈更新」雙擊標題執行「換一組」操作，方式「單手」操作
* 我的-個人資料增加更多信息顯示
* 修正長按「我的」後快捷菜單消失問題
* 修正點擊後的影片沒有置灰問題
* 其他問題修正和優化
apps.localizedDescription: JavDB, the most comprehensive online database of adult videos, and you can search and view all of adult videos in Japan with Censored, Uncensored, Western, Anime and FC2.
